sub-title: ASSISTIVE BASKETBALL DEVICE FOR VISUALLY IMPAIRED
about-content: The Goalfinder is a device that supports visually impaired people playing basketball by playing a sound in fixed intervals and flashing a light strip around the target square to help locate the basket and providing acoustic and visual when hitting or missing. It is easy to set up and manage through the GoalFinder Web App and also allows users to set up different games and challenges
quote: „Mit dem Projekt Goalfinder zeigen die Schüler der HTL Leonding eindrucksvoll, was Innovation bewegen kann. ... Dieses Projekt verbindet modernste Technologie mit sozialer Verantwortung – und leistet damit einen wertvollen Beitrag für unsere Gesellschaft.“
award-0-content: New technologies for people with disabilities
award-1-content: Raise social awareness in today's society
cta-content: Join our community and help make basketball accessible for everyone.
